text:
Amendment to the Children Act 1989
	The Children Act 1989 is amended as follows.
	In section 8 (child arrangements orders and other orders with respect tochildren), after subsection (4)(i) insert—
		Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Female Genital Mutilation Act 2003 (other thanparagraph 3 of that Schedule).”
Extent, commencement and short title
	This Act extends to England and Wales only.
	This Act comes into force on the day on which it is passed.
	This Act may be cited as the Children Act 1989 (Amendment) (Female GenitalMutilation) Act 2019.
